data.author: Kenny L.

changelog.release_notes: v1.0 same features as NFL watchface

data.description:
Support your favorite NBA team with this watchface!  It includes every team some extra options! Show your pride and remind yourself which team sucks this week!

Premium version: $1 (or $3.00 bundle which includes the NFL Watchface, NHL Watchface [Coming Soon], and MLB Watchface [Coming Soon] premium) includes a gameday countdown, health data, weather, and a random team selection option!

Teams Included:
Boston Celtics,
Brooklyn Nets,
New York Knicks,
Philadelphia 76ers,
Toronto Raptors,
Chicago Bulls,
Cleveland Cavaliers,
Detroit Pistons,
Indiana Pacers,
Milwaukee Bucks,
Atlanta Hawks,
Charlotte Hornets,
Miami Heat,
Orlando Magic,
Washington Wizards,
Dallas Mavericks,
Houston Rockets,
Memphis Grizzlies,
New Orleans Pelicans,
San Antonio Spurs,
Denver Nuggets,
Minnesota Timberwolves,
Oklahoma City Thunder,
Portland Trail Blazers,
Utah Jazz,
Golden State Warriors,
Los Angeles Clippers,
Los Angeles Lakers,
Phoenix Suns,
Sacramento Kings

*This watch face is for entertainment purposes only. NBA and team logos are property of their respective owners.
